turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I want to order some pizza from Dominoes please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, I can help with that. Which location do you want to place your order with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want the market ST. location in San Francisco please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, No problem. What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order that new bacon ranch pizza they have.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you mean the Cali Chicken Bacon Ranch hand tossed pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I think that's it. It's the one they feature on their web site.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, I see it there. What size do you want

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want the largest they have.. if there is a party sized that's great..if not - just the large. My daughter is having a party for her kids and I want to bring something cool.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That sounds great. I'll make it a large.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Can you ask them to include some extra napkins, plates and stuff for me - when I get there?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, I'll make a note. I think they have that at the store.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How long until it will be ready for pick up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: About 25 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. What is the total due please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 24.99 with tax. Tip is optional.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll have them send a receipt to you via text for your records.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, they'll just charge the card they have on file?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, Is there anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, Thanks for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, enjoy your pizza.

items.name: the market ST. location in San Francisco
I'll have them send a receipt to you via text for your records.
